sentence: Furniture needs update
Our room was a garden view and older style it was a nice space but the sheets and bedding could use some updating
however the pool needs maintenance and so does their check in process is ridiculous having to wait 3 12 hours to check in
Desperately needs a redo as rooms are dated our bathroom had mold and rust in the ceiling
If they renovate the rooms it had be excellent
Needs some updating with the AC system room smelled like damp

This lack of attention to basic hotel maintenance by house keeping was equal to the clear disinterest demonstrated by several other members of staff Avenue bartenders front desk associates and pool attendants in particular
Disinterested unfriendly staff need hospitality training rooms need updating breakfast reception disorganized ground maintenance loud pool music
The restaurant Tempo needs remodeling
The hotel can use a bit of updating and a refresh
Will i stay here again the answer is yes i m already thinking about renewing my vowes here in 2020
Sweet staff and the upkeep of the property is tremendous I do n’t know how they did it
Very nice resort beautiful view renovated Pool area is nice Service is excellent Just wish they have more restaurant and food options but other than that very nice place
The rooms in buildings 13 14 and 15 are huge and completely redone
The rooms were done over in a clean white theme with great king mattress and nice updated bathrooms
Rooms were updated and comfortable but the best part was the sense of being away from it all with the quiet and the lush and well kept flowers bushes and palm trees
We had a wonderful stay at this newly renovated property with gorgeous views

Whether you sit in between the pool and the ocean or take a walk down the beach the property blends the feeling of a newly renovated beach resort with a sense of being in a remote location where you really feel away from the hustle of dense urbanization where many of us live and look to escape
The property is beautiful newly renovated and the staff is fantastic staff really clean and comfortable room
Work out room was great spa was not open yet but is actively being renovated
